shocking public battle over ChatGPT and Tesla Autopilot deaths

The rivalry between Elon Musk and Sam Altman has escalated recently after Musk publicly warned people not to use ChatGPT. Musk cited links to several tragic deaths related to ChatGPT. Musk shared his comment on X (formerly Twitter),…

external.description: The rivalry between Elon Musk and Sam Altman has escalated recently after Musk publicly warned people not to use ChatGPT. Musk cited links to several tragic deaths related to ChatGPT. Musk shared his comment on X (formerly Twitter), referring to a post claiming nine deaths after using ChatGPT. This includes cases of suicide among teens and adults. Nevertheless, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman backfires against all these claims and responded sharply. He highlighted that he notices contradictions in Musk's statement rather than criticism of AI tools. Sam Altman fires back at Elon Musk…
external.title: shocking public battle over ChatGPT and Tesla Autopilot deaths

record.text:
Nuclear conflict between India and Pakistan could have happened due to AI, big revelation in the report

Report regarding Operation Sindoor There was conflict between India and Pakistan in several months of the year 2025. Now regarding this conflict, international think tank SIPRI has warned that…

external.description: Report regarding Operation Sindoor There was conflict between India and Pakistan in several months of the year 2025. Now regarding this conflict, international think tank SIPRI has warned that during the tension, fake information generated by Artificial Intelligence (AI) had made the situation more serious. According to reports, this confrontation could have easily turned into a protracted conflict. There could even be a danger of a direct nuclear conflict between the two nuclear armed countries. Sweden-based Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI) released this research note on its website on Tuesday.
external.title: Nuclear conflict between India and Pakistan could have happened due to AI, big revelation in the report

昨日は完全ダウン。
今日も本調子ではないけれど普通に動けるまで回復しました。
体調不良で運動できないのに食べてばかりで先週の小旅行で太った分が減りません。

record.text:
This is the most astonishing graph of what the Trump regime has done to US science. They have destroyed the federal science workforce across the board. The negative impacts on Americans will be felt for generations, and the US might never be the same again.

www.nature.com/immersive/d4...

images.alt: This line graph illustrates the percentage change in agency staff levels from the previous year for nine major U.S. federal scientific and health organizations between the fiscal years 2016 and 2025. The agencies tracked include the CDC, Department of Energy, EPA, FDA, NASA, NIH, NIST, NOAA, and NSF. For the majority of the timeline between 2016 and 2023, the agencies show relatively stable fluctuations, generally staying within a range of +5% to -5% change per year. However, there is a dramatic and uniform plummet starting in the 2024–25 period. Every agency depicted shows a sharp downward trajectory, with staffing losses ranging from approximately -15% to over -25%. The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) shows the most significant decline, dropping to roughly -26%, while the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) shows the least severe but still substantial drop at approximately -15%.

images.alt:
Bleeding, Battered But Mlot-Mroz Wrong Minority
By Henry J. Taylor
It would be nice if Senators Robert and Edward Kennedy paid a hospital visit to patriot Joseph Mlot-Mroz, mercilessly stabbed, beaten and bludgeoned in Boston outside the headquarters of the Southern Christian Leadership Conference while peacefully demonstrating against its Poor People's March on Washington.
One of Mlot-Mroz's signs read: "For God, Freedom and Country. Fight Com-, munism in Vietnam and Red Stooges at Home." His other proclaimed: "I am fighting poverty. I work! Have you tried it? It works!"
Cut up and bleeding under the wild attack in the first violence of the trek on Washington, Mlot-Mroz looked, in vain, for help.
From Bobby Kennedy's first day as Attorney General he has been probably the nation's No. 1 sponsor of demonstrations. What's the matter with encouraging Mlot-Mroz? Apparently that's quite different.

record.text: GitHub Security Lab deploys AI to automate vulnerability triage 30 real exploits found since August 2025. The open-source Taskflow Agent uses Claude Sonnet 3.5 to filter false positives that traditional tools miss. Game-changer for security teams. #AdwaitX #CyberSecurity #AI #Github

external.description: Quick Brief The Launch: GitHub Security Lab released its open-source Taskflow Agent AI framework, automating security alert triage using large language models. The Impact: The system discovered approximately 30 exploitable vulnerabilities in production codebases since August 2025, many of which have already been fixed and published. The Technology: Built primarily on Claude Sonnet 3.5, the framework processes CodeQL scanning alerts through multi-stage taskflows, reducing false positives without dynamic validation.
external.title: GitHub Security Lab Unveils AI-Powered Vulnerability Triage Framework: 30 Real-World Exploits Discovered

Auf dem offiziellen X Account der Anime Umsetzung wurde heute bekannt gegeben, dass »The Drops of God« im April 2026 im japanischen TV startet. Crunchyroll kündigte bereits ein Simulcast dazu an.

Shizuku Kanzaki ist der Sohn des legendären Weinkritikers Yutaka Kanzaki und hasst alles, was mit Wein zu tun hat. Nach dem Tod seines Vaters zwingt dessen Testament ihn in ein irrwitziges Duell: Wer die „12 Apostel“ und die legendären „Drops of God“ richtig erkennt, erbt Sammlung und Anwesen. Doch Shizuku steht ohne Verkosterfahrung dem Adoptivsohn Issei Tomine, dem „Prince of Wine“, gegenüber. Ein Jahr Zeit, null Routine und ein Wettlauf gegen die Uhr.

Mit einem neuen Trailer wurde heute erstmals der Opening-Song »Chikai wa Kyun to.« von HoneyWorks feat. Airi Suzuki vorgestellt. Zusätzlich wurde ein neues Key-Visual veröffentlicht. Die Anime-Adaption startet im April 2026 im japanischen TV.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Maria, die jüngste Tochter eines Herzogs, galt schon früh als großes Talent und wurde als Erbin der Familie erzogen, bis die Geburt ihres Bruders alles änderte. Um nicht als alte Jungfer zu enden, sucht sie verzweifelt nach einem Ehemann, doch alle geeigneten Adligen sind vergeben.  In der Hoffnung auf eine bessere Zukunft reist sie zum Studium ins Ausland. Doch plötzlich verkündet der Kronprinz, dass er ihre Verlobung auflöst, obwohl sie sich noch nie begegnet sind!  „Wie bitte?! Seit wann war ich verlobt?!“

images.alt:
Ein neuer Charakter-Trailer wurde veröffentlicht, der »Bertia« in den Fokus rückt. Die Rolle wird von Miyu Tomita gesprochen. Die Anime-Adaption startet im laufe des Jahres 2026 im japanischen TV. 

🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Bertia« von Miyu Tomita

📜 Beschreibung 》
Für den hochbegabten Kronprinzen Cecil Glow Alfostar ist jeder Tag langweilig. Alles fällt ihm zu leicht, nichts weckt wirklich sein Interesse. Das ändert sich erst, als er seine Verlobte Bertia Evil Nochesse trifft, die sich selbst als „Villainess“ bezeichnet.  Bertia behauptet, sie sei in die Welt eines Otome-Games wiedergeboren worden und ihre Rolle sei es, die Liebe zwischen Cecil und der Heldin zu sabotieren. Voller Eifer versucht sie, die Bösewichtin zu spielen – doch ihre „bösen Taten“ wirken in Wahrheit nur ehrlich und liebenswert. Für Cecil wird das Leben mit seiner ahnungslos gutmütigen Verlobten plötzlich alles andere als langweilig.

Top 10 countries in Asia with the highest quality of life
https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/life-style/travel/destinations/top-10-countries-in-asia-with-the-highest-quality-of-life/photostory/126681392.cms

external.description: Quality of life has become a key metric for comparing how countries perform beyond GDP and economic growth. The Quality of Life Index attempts to capture how people actually live, how safe they feel, how far their income stretches, how clean their surroundings are, how accessible healthcare is, and how much time they lose to daily commutes. The index used here is from Numbeo, which relies on user-contributed data and questionnaires, together with an empirical formula that takes into account various indicators. These range from purchasing power, pollution and housing affordability to cost of living, safety, healthcare quality, traffic commute times and climate. Higher scores denote more favourable conditions for overall living, and lower scores indicate structural or lifestyle stressors.According to the 2026 statistics, these are the 10 best countries in Asia ranked by overall quality of life. Data sourced from Numbeo.
external.title: Top 10 countries in Asia with the highest quality of life

White Sox trade Luis Robert Jr. to Mets

long-awaited louis robert jr. Trade has arrived. The Mets announced they have acquired the former All-Star center fielder from the White Sox as a young infielder and outfielder. Luis Angel Acuña and minor league right-hander truman paley. Since Robert and…

external.description: long-awaited louis robert jr. Trade has arrived. The Mets announced they have acquired the former All-Star center fielder from the White Sox as a young infielder and outfielder. Luis Angel Acuña and minor league right-hander truman paley. Since Robert and Acuña were each on the 40-man roster, there was no cash involved and no corresponding moves. This puts an end to long-running trade rumors for Robert. The White Sox have retained center field through multiple rebuilding seasons. In retrospect, they certainly wish they had moved him during the 2023-24 offseason.
external.title: White Sox trade Luis Robert Jr. to Mets

record.text: 📌 Organizations Are Repeating Basic Security Mistakes in AI Systems Deployment https://www.cyberhub.blog/article/18299-organizations-are-repeating-basic-security-mistakes-in-ai-systems-deployment

external.description: The post highlights that recent security flaws in AI systems (such as Google Gemini, Microsoft Copilot, or Google Cloud AI) reveal fundamental design errors, including the lack of input validation, excessive permissions, or the execution of untrusted commands. These vulnerabilities, comparable to issues resolved decades ago in cybersecurity, are framed as architectural failures rather than sophisticated attacks. Organizations are rushing to deploy these systems while ignoring core principles like the *principle of least privilege* or defense in depth.
external.title: Organizations Are Repeating Basic Security Mistakes in AI Systems Deployment

record.text: 📌 Cybersecurity Researchers Uncover Ongoing KongTuke Campaign Using Fake Chrome Ad-Blocker Extension https://www.cyberhub.blog/article/18297-cybersecurity-researchers-uncover-ongoing-kongtuke-campaign-using-fake-chrome-ad-blocker-extension

external.description: Cybersecurity researchers have uncovered an ongoing campaign named *KongTuke*, which employs a malicious Chrome extension disguised as an ad-blocker. The extension intentionally crashes the browser to trick victims into executing arbitrary commands through tactics similar to *ClickFix*, ultimately deploying *ModeloRAT*, a previously undocumented remote access trojan (RAT). This attack represents an evolution of *ClickFix* techniques. No specific date or geographic targets have been mentioned. The extension exploits legitimate Chrome features to bypass security mechanisms. *ModeloRAT* enables remote control of infected systems.
external.title: Cybersecurity Researchers Uncover Ongoing KongTuke Campaign Using Fake Chrome Ad-Blocker Extension

• identifies its perspective as the world’s generative rule
• treats narrative as a function of ontology, not plot

• transmedia studies
• game studies
• speculative realism
• platform studies
• narrative architecture theory

Kuroda was already doing this in 2014.

record.text: cheese mouse
Marcille and Falin
I've got a mandatory Copilot training scheduled at work today. I'd be surprised if they showed a single situation where it's useful and works consistently well for my job.

Fun story: My job requests we run our emails through Copilot to make them "sound more professional."  I quit using it after the first day because it was making my emails objectively harder to read.  Oh, and less professional.
Pretty sure that's what they're hoping for, yeah.  That we're just going to go quietly into that not-so-good night.

record.text: Video Tutorial:  How to disable Copilot in Word,excel,power point,

external.description:
In this video, we will show you how to disable Copilot in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook on a Windows PC. Copilot is now deeply integrated into Windows, including Microsoft 365 apps. 
While this integration aims to help users perform tasks quickly and easily, not everyone is comfortable with AI features active all the time. 
If you’re one of those users who prefer a simple and distraction-free work environment, or you’re concerned that your data may be accessed or processed by AI, you can safely disable Copilot in your Office apps.

Link: https://www.thewindowsclub.com/how-to-disable-copilot-in-word-excel-powerpoint-outlook

00:00 Intro
00:47 Disable Copilot in Microsoft Word 
01:08 Disable Copilot in Microsoft Excel
01:26 Disable Copilot in Microsoft PowerPoint
01:45 Disable Copilot in Microsoft OneNote
02:10 Disable Copilot in the new Outlook app
02:42 Disable Copilot by changing your Microsoft 365 account privacy settings
03:25 Method Hide the Copilot button without disabling Copilot

images.alt:
Screenshot of a post made by Windows Latest (@WindowsLatest) on Twitter:

Microsoft wants everybody to embrace Copilot / AI, or the bubble could burst.

Satya Nadella warns AI boom could falter without wider adoption.

“For this not to be a bubble by definition, it requires that the benefits of this are much more evenly spread,” said Nadella in a statement to FT. 

“I’m much more confident that this is a technology that will, in fact, build on the rails of cloud and mobile, diffuse faster, and bend the productivity curve, and bring local surplus and economic growth all around the world,” he added.

While all other AI tools are booming, Copilot on the web has just 1% market share, and Microsoft won't tell us how many people use Copilot on Windows 11.
